chunks.chunk_text: Hello 同情家族歡迎收聽 Look Back Sunday在這個節目John老師會彙整過去不同國家與主題的熱門跟讀文章讓你可以在15分鐘內吸收最精華的世界史詩曲文Let's get right to it!

chunks.chunk_text: For Hans-Peter Wipplinger, the director of Vienna's Leopold Museum, the past few weeks have been challenging.As climate protesters across Europe stepped up their attacks against art,Wipplinger took measures to protect his storied collection, which includes famous paintings by Gustav Klimt and Egon Scheele.Bags were banned, coats too.The museum hired extra guards to patrol its fivefold.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS - 藝術品相關時事趣聞 All about 2023 artworks.json

chunks.chunk_text: It didn't work.Last week, members of a group called Last Generation walked into the museum and threw black liquid at one of Klimt's major works,Death and Life.A protester had sneaked the liquid into the museum in a hot water bottle strapped to his chest,Wipplinger said.The Klimt, protected by glass, was unharmed.But Wipplinger said his security team could only have stopped the attack by subjecting
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS - 藝術品相關時事趣聞 All about 2023 artworks.json

chunks.chunk_text: visitors to invasive body searches,like at the airport.He didn't want to even consider that prospect, he added.With the attacks showing no sign of abating,museum directors across Europe are settling into a nervous new equilibrium,fearful for the works in their care,but unwilling to compromise on making visitors feel welcome.So far nothing has been permanently damaged.But many fear that an accident or
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS - 藝術品相關時事趣聞 All about 2023 artworks.json

chunks.chunk_text: escalation in the protesters' tactics could result in a masterpiece being destroyed.The actions, which began in Britain in June,are already increasing in frequency and daring.At first, protesters glued themselves to the frames of famous paintings,but since footage of activists splattered Vincent van Gogh's sunflowers with tomato soup spread rapidly on social media in October,masterpieces have been
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS - 藝術品相關時事趣聞 All about 2023 artworks.json

chunks.chunk_text: induced in pea soup,mashed potatoes and flour.Those works were all protected by glass,and the protesters' projectiles never touched an artist's brushstroke.Yet last month,protesters in Paris poured orange paint directly onto a silver Charles Ray sculpture outside the Burz de Commerce contemporary art space.A Burz de Commerce spokesperson said the sculpture was
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS - 藝術品相關時事趣聞 All about 2023 artworks.json

chunks.chunk_text: cleaned within a few hours.In a statement last month,signed by the leaders of more than 90 of the world's largest art institutions,museums administrators said they were deeply shaken by the protesters' risky endangerment of artworks.Yet few museums appear to have taken bold steps to protect their collections.Norway's National Museum and the Bobberini Museum in Potsdam,Germany,
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS - 藝術品相關時事趣聞 All about 2023 artworks.json

chunks.chunk_text: have banned visitors from taking bags or jackets into their exhibition halls.Others have made no changes.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS - 藝術品相關時事趣聞 All about 2023 artworks.json

chunks.chunk_text: At the recent discovery,the work entitled New York City One will continue to be displayed the wrong way up to avoid it being damaged.It has hung at the art collection of the German state of North Rhine-Westphalia in Dusseldorf since 1980.Curator Susan Mayer-Buser noticed the long-standing error when researching the museum's new show on the artist earlier this year,but warned
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS - 藝術品相關時事趣聞 All about 2023 artworks.json

chunks.chunk_text: it could disintegrate if it was hung the right side up now.Manga artist falls for fake Mark Ruffalo,loses $500,000.The latest work from veteran manga artist Chikae Ide follows her common theme of romance and relationships,but Poison Love is quite different than her previous pieces.
